name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
tooltip:
Fight for Warsong Gulch

Don't forget the fight for Warsong Gulch is about more than just protecting trees.  It's about keeping a natural barrier between Ashenvale and the Barrens.  Do you bring any news from the battlefield, <name>?

Requirements:
- Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor x 3
